title: Game crashed for everyone just 5-10 min ago.
body: I was in the middle of a game (thank god it was normal) and the game just stupped and statedi was disconnected I obviously thought it was my internet connection but it was not, so I closed the game and the game just vanished.  Was this just flicker in the servers or something like that or is this going to become a major problem?

replies.body: This just happened to me as well.
Thanks for the heads up.  I'll check to see if anything might be going on.

Was this the match with Camille?  It looks like the game lost connection with our servers, so it kind of acts like it didn't exist.  It's super rare and it may have been a result of patching today, but everything looks okay now.
